column4: Did I do something wrong with this bug report anyone? Been two days without a response? https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/296045
new to ubuntu. Don't know how they work.. ;) Just wanted to make sure I didn't do something wrong or place the bug in the wrong place..
I know linux but not sure on what the normal wait period is for filing a bug. With Gentoo, they respond very quick with atleast a response to know they're looking at it.
